note: This JSON is proprietary and should not be redistributed without permission.

DisableHyperVServices.Command: $names=@('Microsoft Hypervisor Service','Microsoft Hyper-V Virtualization Infrastructure Driver'); $found=$false; foreach($n in $names){ $devs=Get-PnpDevice -FriendlyName $n -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if(-not $devs){ $devs=Get-PnpDevice -FriendlyName ('*{0}*' -f $n) -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; if($devs){ $found=$true; foreach($d in $devs){ Disable-PnpDevice -InstanceId $d.InstanceId -Confirm:$false -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } } }; if(-not $found){ throw 'No matching Hyper-V related devices found.' }

EnableHyperVServices.Command: $names=@('Microsoft Hypervisor Service','Microsoft Hyper-V Virtualization Infrastructure Driver'); $found=$false; foreach($n in $names){ $devs=Get-PnpDevice -FriendlyName $n -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if(-not $devs){ $devs=Get-PnpDevice -FriendlyName ('*{0}*' -f $n) -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; if($devs){ $found=$true; foreach($d in $devs){ Enable-PnpDevice -InstanceId $d.InstanceId -Confirm:$false -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } } }; if(-not $found){ throw 'No matching Hyper-V related devices found.' }
